===@@id="3_Serviceskind"@@~Services kind===


~The type <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|service~_kind>> describe all four kind of services~:
* external ~(attached~) services
* ~(internal~) attached services
* ~(internal~) attached coservices
* ~(internal~) non~-attached coservices

===@@id="3_Abstracttypeofservices"@@~Abstract type of services===

<<pre class="ocsforge_color odocwiki_code" id="TYPEservice"|<<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|type>> <<span class="odocwiki_type"|\\  <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| ( >>'get, 'post, +[< <<a_api subproject="client" text="service_method" | type Eliom_service.service_method >> ]\\    , +[< <<a_api subproject="client" text="attached" | type Eliom_service.attached >> ], +[< <<a_api subproject="client" text="service_kind" | type Eliom_service.service_kind >> ]\\    , +[< <<a_api subproject="client" text="suff" | type Eliom_service.suff >> ], 'gn, 'pn\\    , +[< <<a_api subproject="client" text="registrable" | type Eliom_service.registrable >> ], +'ret<<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| ) >>>> <<span class="odocwiki_name"|service>>>><<div class="odocwiki_info"|~Type of services~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'get>> is the type of ~G~E~T parameters expected by the service~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'post>> is the type of ~P~O~S~T parameters expected by the service~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'meth>> the ~H~T~T~P method
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'attached>> attached or non~-attached
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'kind>> describes the services~'s kind ~: service~, coservice~, external~. ~It is a subtype of <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_service.service_kind >>~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'tipo>> the type paremeter of subtype <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_service.suff >> states the kind
      of parameters it uses~: suffix or not~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'gn>> is the type of ~G~E~T parameters names~. ~See <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_parameter.param_name >> and
            form generation functions ~(e~. g~. <<a_api subproject="client" | val Eliom_content.Html5.D.get_form >>~)~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'pn>> is the type of ~P~O~S~T parameters names~. ~See <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_parameter.param_name >> and
            form generation functions ~(e~. g~. <<a_api subproject="client" | val Eliom_content.Html5.D.post_form >>~)~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'reg>> the type parameter of subtype <<a_api subproject="client" | type Eliom_service.registrable >> tells if it is possible to
      register a handler on this service~.
* <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"| ~'ret>> is an information on what the service returns~.
            ~See <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~Eliom~_registration~.kind>>~.

>>
<<pre class="ocsforge_color odocwiki_code" id="TYPEhttp_service"|<<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|type>> <<span class="odocwiki_name"|http~_service>> <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"|~=>> <<span class="odocwiki_type"|[ `Http ]>> >><<div class="odocwiki_info"|~Types of groups of services~.
>>

<<pre id="VALhttps_void_coservice'" class="ocsforge_color odocwiki_code"|<<span class="ocsforge_color_keyword"|val>> <<span class="odocwiki_name"|https~_void~_coservice~'>> <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"|~:>> <<span class="odocwiki_type"|\\  <<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| ( >>unit, unit, [< <<a_api subproject="client" text="service_method" | type Eliom_service.service_method >> > `Get ],\\   [< <<a_api subproject="client" text="attached" | type Eliom_service.attached >> > `Nonattached ],\\   [< <<a_api subproject="client" text="service_kind" | type Eliom_service.service_kind >> > `NonattachedCoservice ],\\   [ `WithoutSuffix ], unit, unit,\\   [< <<a_api subproject="client" text="registrable" | type Eliom_service.registrable >> > `Unregistrable ],\\   [> <<a_api subproject="client" text="non_ocaml_service" | type Eliom_service.non_ocaml_service >> ]<<span class="ocsforge_color_delimiter"| ) >>\\  <<a_api subproject="client" text="service" | type Eliom_service.service >>>>>><<div class="odocwiki_info"|~A predefined non~-attached action with special behaviour~:

    ~It does not keep non attached ~G~E~T parameters~.
